content: small bag introduction thank you for selecting my small bag pattern - the perfect accessory i hope that working on the bag brings you a lot of joy i tried making all of the instructions clear and understandable but in case of any doubts feel free to dm me have fun and of course check out my other products at madebylisek etsy com you can also follow my instagram @madeby__lisek to get all the latest updates and behind-the- scenes photos materials time 2 h this tutorial difficulty 2/5 yarn / cord crochet hook scissors us terms suggestions of colors and hook sizes description of yarn fibre 100% recycled cotton braided cord cotton filling width 3mm length 100m/108yds weight ~250g note i recommend aran+ yarns/cords final size material bobbiny braided cord -
